revised_title: Improvement in Telescopes: Peter Dollond's New Refracting Telescopes
tldr: Peter Dollond shares his improvement in refracting telescopes by combining different refractive mediums and correcting aberrations in object glasses. He successfully creates an object glass of 5 feet focal length and an aperture of 3 3/4 inches, and later completes another one of 3 1/2 feet focal length with the same aperture.
